thread.title: Miracle Flights for Kids® Rallies Voters for Final Push to Win $10,000 Grant
thread.title_full: Miracle Flights for Kids® Rallies Voters for Final Push to Win $10,000 Grant - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Miracle Flights for Kids® Rallies Voters for Final Push to Win $10,000 Grant
text:
Miracle Flights for Kids
GREEN VALLEY, Nev., Sept. 25, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Miracle Flights for Kids , the nation's leading medical flight organization, is calling all supporters to cast their final ballots in the 2015 Lightspeed Aviation Foundation Pilots Choice Awards Grant program.
Logo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20150924/270660LOGO
The Lightspeed Aviation Foundation was established by Lightspeed Aviation Corporation to serve the aviation community. In this annual contest, aviation-related charities are chosen to compete in an online poll to receive grants in support of their cause.
Voting began Thursday, April 23 and will soon end on Thursday, Oct. 15 .
For nearly 30 years, Miracle Flights for Kids has been flying sick children to out-of-state medical care, no matter the distance or frequency. Founder and National President Ann McGee said, "We're counting on our community to rally together and make one final push. Every vote counts toward the healthier future of a child."
Votes for Miracle Flights' kids can be cast at: http://www.lightspeedaviationfoundation.org/content.cfm/Voting/Get-to-know-the-2015-finalists/Miracle-Flights-for-Kids .
About Miracle Flights
Miracle Flights for Kids is a 501(c)(3) nonprofit organization that provides free medical air transportation via commercial airlines throughout the United States. Now in its 30 th year of operation, Miracle Flights has coordinated more than 92,000 flights and counting. For more information about Miracle Flights for Kids, to request flight assistance, or to make a donation, call (800) FLY-1711 (800-359-1711) or visit www.miracleflights.org .
